title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker container.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama, sync & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; docker run once and chat in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama, supports chat, generate and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama written in Node; fuzzy search models, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Browser extension that adds GitHub Copilot-like autocomplete powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; NuGet OllamaSharp with async streaming and chat interfaces.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate ollama-rs providing strongly-typed wrappers over Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger SDK example pipeline that spins up Ollama, pulls a model and runs tests in CI.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to integrate local Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI wrapper around Ollama that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate text and chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray example showing how to scale Ollama inference workers across a Ray cluster.
